tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_regulations (
  regulation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_title TEXT NOT NULL,
  regulation_content TEXT,
  effective_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE statutes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  statute_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE regulations_table (
  regulation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name STRING,
  regulation_description TEXT,
  regulation_category STRING
)

CREATE TABLE statutes_table (
  statute_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  statute_name STRING,
  statute_description TEXT,
  statute_category STRING
)

CREATE TABLE penalties_table (
  penalty_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  penalty_name STRING,
  penalty_description TEXT,
  penalty_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE jurisdictions_table (
  jurisdiction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  jurisdiction_name STRING,
  jurisdiction_description TEXT,
  jurisdiction_region STRING
)

CREATE TABLE references_table (
  reference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  reference_name STRING,
  reference_description TEXT,
  reference_source TEXT
)
